name: Energy Removal
text: Choose 1 Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon and discard it.

effect.text: Choose 1 Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon and discard it.

weaknesses: Less impactful than Super Energy Removal
synergies: Super Energy Removal - More energy denial

competitiveHistory: Energy Removal was a staple in energy denial strategies, often used alongside Super Energy Removal for maximum disruption.

rulings.ruling: You choose which of your opponent's Pokemon to target.
You choose which Energy card to discard from that Pokemon.
